danish_publication: Her på egnen har de haft så ondt af det for Jerusalems skomager, at de har ladet deres plove stå ude julen over, for at han kunde have noget at hvile sig på. "Vi har så ondt af det for ham, det sölle fjolter!" har a hørt mange sige, "han må have noget at hvile sig på, når han kommer her igjennem."
english_publication: Here in the area they felt so bad for the Jerusalem’s Cobbler that they left their plows outside during Christmas so that he’d have some place to rest. “We feel so bad for him, that poor fool!” I’ve heard lot’s of people say, “he needs to have a place to rest when he comes through here.”
